alert.note: Alert for Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 3:55AM PST until December 30 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Spotty light freezing drizzle possible with little to no accumulation. * WHERE...In Washington, I-5 Corridor in Cowlitz County. In Oregon, Lower Columbia. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Chances for freezing drizzle will only last for a few hours during the morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County
